content.raw:
In pull request #299, we made several changes, that may address these concerns:

* min_depth parameter was added to the firehose links, which stabilizes contacts. I have a vrc_task_3 that's been running for 35 minutes of simulation time, and it's still on the table. The links aren't all in straight lines, but it's still in pretty good shape. I can post screenshots if you're interested.
* We changed the standpipe collisions so there is now a physical opening, though it is not the full depth of the standpipe.
